trends: There have been no other sightings in Montgmery Center
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband was on the balcony at 9.47 pm and called me urgently to come out and look at this. He was looking at what appeared to be a large craft moving very slowly just above and in front of the mountains in front of our house in Vermont. It was moving too slow for a plane, was the wrong shape, was soundless and had 3 or 4 lights that didn't blink. It took about 10 minutes to move a distance of about 5 miles before it disappeared behind the trees and we could no longer see it on its journey. We felt so blessed to see what for us was most certainly a UFO and just wished it would turn and come closer to the house so we could see more details.
Summary: Clearly observed craft moving slowly and quietly in a direction not generally traversed by planes or satellites.
